symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms to get AI-powered informational suggestions for over-the-counter medicines and potential medical specialties to consult. This is not medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., I have a runny nose, sore throat, and a slight fever...
analysisResultsDescription: Based on the symptoms you provided, here are some informational suggestions. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical advice.
suggestedMedicinesInfo: The following are AI-generated suggestions and not medical advice. Always read labels and consult a healthcare professional before taking any medication.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: For your symptoms, you might consider consulting a specialist in: {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion. A primary care doctor can also provide guidance or a referral if needed.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: The AI could not provide specific over-the-counter medicine suggestions based on the input. Please consult a healthcare professional for advice.
footerDisclaimer: This tool provides AI-generated information for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
noDataGenerated: The AI could not generate {entity} examples for {location}{specialtyString} at this time. Please try a different location or check back later.
validationMaxChars: Please enter no more than {count} characters.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location can be at most {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty can be at most {count} characters.
validationFailedMessage: Please correct the errors in the form.
errorDuringAnalysisMessage: An error occurred during analysis. Please try again.
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}. Please try again.
adminLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
postTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your blog post
postContentPlaceholder: Write your blog post content here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: Enter a short summary or excerpt
blogPostCreationError: Failed to create blog post. Please try again.
